snippet: Geralyn Lucas, the author of “Why I Wore Lipstick to My Mastectomy,” has a new book about what life has been like since.
abstract: Day Out With column on Geralyn Lucas, author and breast cancer survivor who is in New York promoting new book Then Came Life: Living With Courage, Spirit, and Gratitude After Breast Cancer.
lead_paragraph: Geralyn Lucas, the author of “Why I Wore Lipstick to My Mastectomy,” has a new book about what life has been like since.

headline.seo: Geralyn Lucas Uses Tattoos as Symbols of Surviving Cancer
headline.main: A Constellation of Love and Memory
headline.print_headline: A Constellation of Love and Memory
